channel.title: Log-In Different places
channel.description:
I am working on a server and I was wondering before I started coding this in, want to know if it is even possible. Is it possible to make it so when you log in, you log in at some random place. And when you log out your account doesn't save, just your username and password.(There is reasoning for that) If you know for a fact it is possible say it is, not asking how to do it, will ask for help from my friends but they aren't sure if it is possible.
Thanks for the help.
- Spades

item.title: Log-In Different places
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Alright, an you’re welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Log-In Different places
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“GrimReapersScythe, post:2, topic:308295”]Yes, this is possible. For the first part, I’m not sure how it’s done, but it was done on Ambitionz V1.0 420 server.
Also, to make it save the users but not the skills or anything, just declare in the logout void, to set all skills, coords, and everything to original.[/quote]

Alright, thank you. I will give it a try.

Read full topic

item.title: Log-In Different places
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Yes, this is possible. For the first part, I’m not sure how it’s done, but it was done on Ambitionz V1.0 420 server.
Also, to make it save the users but not the skills or anything, just declare in the logout void, to set all skills, coords, and everything to original.

Read full topic
